column5: Tried posting this under Vermilion Bay, maybe it was too specific. Wondering how the lakes are in the Vermilion Bay, Dryden, Kenora area are doing in regards to turnover? Done? Not started? Thanks

[font color=green size=3][b]Different lakes turnover at different times, due to amounts of water and depths mostly. I would think it is too early, two weeks ago water temps were in the 60's on Wabaskang.
On this end of Lac Seul, turnover was the 24-25 of August after several days of cold wind and rain; earliest I've ever experienced.
